IBM MessageSight log rotation configurations can be updated by using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update LogConfig help imaserver update LogConfig "Name=value" "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update LogConfig "Name=imaserver-connection.log" "MaxLogSize=25M" "RotationCount=4"
